member.name: F:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.AnimationMethod.Roll
member.summary: Rolls out from edge when showing and into edge when hiding.
member.remarks: This is the default animation method and requires a direction.

member.name: F:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.AnimationMethod.Centre
member.summary: Expands out from centre when showing and collapses into centre when hiding.

member.name: F:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.AnimationMethod.Slide
member.summary: Slides out from edge when showing and slides into edge when hiding.

member.name: F:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.AnimationMethod.Blend
member.summary: Fades from transaprent to opaque when showing and from opaque to transparent when hiding.

member.name: T:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.AnimationMethod
member.summary: The methods of animation available.

member.name: F:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.AnimationDirection.Right
member.summary: From left to right.

member.name: F:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.AnimationDirection.Left
member.summary: From right to left.

member.name: F:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.AnimationDirection.Down
member.summary: From top to bottom.

member.name: F:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.AnimationDirection.Up
member.summary: From bottom to top.

member.name: T:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.AnimationDirection
member.summary: The directions in which the Roll and Slide animations can be shown.
member.remarks: Horizontal and vertical directions can be combined to create diagonal animations.

member.name: F:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.AW_HIDE
member.summary: Hide the form.

member.name: F:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.AW_ACTIVATE
member.summary: Activate the form.

member.name: F:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.DEFAULT_DURATION
member.summary: The number of milliseconds over which the animation occurs if no value is specified.

member.name: F:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator._form
member.summary: The form to be animated.

member.name: F:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator._method
member.summary: The animation method used to show and hide the form.

member.name: F:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator._direction
member.summary: The direction in which to Roll or Slide the form.

member.name: F:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator._duration
member.summary: The number of milliseconds over which the animation is played.

member.name: P:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.Method
member.summary: Gets or sets the animation method used to show and hide the form.
member.value: The animation method used to show and hide the form.
member.remarks: Roll is used by default if no method is specified.

member.name: P:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.Direction
member.summary: Gets or sets the direction in which the animation is performed.
member.value: The direction in which the animation is performed.
member.remarks: The direction is only applicable to the Roll and Slide methods.

member.name: P:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.Duration
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of milliseconds over which the animation is played.
member.value: The number of milliseconds over which the animation is played.

member.name: P:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.Form
member.summary: Gets the form to be animated.

member.name: M:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.AnimateWindow(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Windows API function to animate a window.

member.name: M:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.#ctor(System.Windows.Forms.Form)
member.summary: Creates a new FormAnimator object for the specified form.
member.remarks: No animation will be used unless the Method and/or Direction properties are set independently. The Duration is set to quarter of a second by default.

member.name: M:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.#ctor(System.Windows.Forms.Form,WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.AnimationMethod,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new FormAnimator object for the specified form using the specified method over the specified duration.
member.param: The animation method used to show and hide the form.
The number of milliseconds over which the animation is played.
member.remarks: No animation will be used for the Roll or Slide methods unless the Direction property is set independently.

member.name: M:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.#ctor(System.Windows.Forms.Form,WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.AnimationMethod,WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.AnimationDirection,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new FormAnimator object for the specified form using the specified method in the specified direction over the specified duration.
member.param: The animation method used to show and hide the form.
The direction in which to animate the form.
The number of milliseconds over which the animation is played.
member.remarks: The direction argument will have no effect if the Centre or Blend method is specified.

member.name: M:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.Form_Load(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Animates the form automatically when it is loaded.

member.name: M:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.Form_VisibleChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Animates the form automatically when it is shown or hidden.

member.name: M:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator.Form_Closing(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs)
member.summary: Animates the form automatically when it closes.

member.name: T:WinGestorRequerimientos.FormAnimator
member.summary: Animates a form when it is shown, hidden or closed.
member.remarks: MDI child forms do not support the Blend method and only support other methods while being displayed for the first time and when closing.

member.name: F:WinGestorRequerimientos.SesionActualWindows.URL_ERROR_1010
member.summary: Error N°: 1010 Descripción: Usuario inválido. No se pudo verificar con éxito su estado de sesión. Si le vuelve a ocurrir, por favor verifique con el administrador del sistema.

member.name: F:WinGestorRequerimientos.SesionActualWindows.URL_ERROR_515
member.summary: Error N°: 515 Descripción: No existe sesion, o su browser no soporta el uso de cookies.(REGISTRO)

member.name: F:WinGestorRequerimientos.SesionActualWindows.URL_ERROR_1011
member.summary: Error N°: 1011 Descripción: Sesión terminada. El tiempo de expiración para la sesión terminó. Por favor vuelva a logonearse.

member.name: F:WinGestorRequerimientos.SesionActualWindows.URL_ERROR_1024
member.summary: Error N°: 1024 Descripción: El nombre de usuario gsdfsdf no existe. Por favor registrese o contáctese con el administrador del sistema.

member.name: F:WinGestorRequerimientos.SesionActualWindows.URL_ERROR_1023
member.summary: Error N°: 1023 Descripción: La clave del usuario gmedina está vencida. Por favor cambie su clave ingresando en la opción 'Cambio de clave'.

member.name: F:WinGestorRequerimientos.SesionActualWindows.URL_ERROR_1022
member.summary: Error N°: 1022 Descripción: La clave suministrada para el nombre de usuario gmedina no es la correcta. Por favor vuelva a intentarlo, o recurra a la opción 'Olvido de clave'.
